strapiPost.title: Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday, NWA! There's a lot going on this weekend around the region, here is what we recommend checking out:

  • World of dance: The Botanical Garden of the Ozarks is hosting a free international music and dance festival on Sunday.
  • Oktoberfest: Natural State Beer Co. fundraiser is on Saturday with local brews, games, and food.
  • Game day: Arkansas Football takes on Georgia Southern Saturday at 3p in Fayetteville.
  • Get your cracker jacks: You can watch the Northwest Arkansas Naturals play the Springfield Cardinals every day this weekend.
  • Head bobbin: Live music at the Railyard, the Butterfield Stage, and Prairie Street. As per usual.
  • Art Up: There's a pop-up art market this Friday and Saturday in Rogers.
  • Student of the outdoors: It's Nature Weekend at Crystal Bridges and there is an array of wonderful ways get outside and learn.
  • Doing our part: The City of Fayetteville is hosting a clean up day on Saturday as opportunity for us to give back to our beautiful home.

Have a great weekend, and we'll see you Monday!
